# Stan

> Minimal, type-safe state management

- **Repository**: https://github.com/rkrupinski/stan
- **Documentation**: https://stan.party

Stan is a minimal, type-safe state management library. It is framework-agnostic at its core, but comes with first-class React bindings.

## Documentation

- [Introduction](https://stan.party/)
- [Installation](https://stan.party/docs/getting-started/installation)
- [Examples](https://stan.party/docs/getting-started/examples)

## API Reference

- [State](https://stan.party/docs/api/state)
- [atom](https://stan.party/docs/api/atom)
- [atomFamily](https://stan.party/docs/api/atomFamily)
- [selector](https://stan.party/docs/api/selector)
- [selectorFamily](https://stan.party/docs/api/selectorFamily)
- [Store](https://stan.party/docs/api/store)
- [Utils](https://stan.party/docs/api/utils)
- [React](https://stan.party/docs/api/react)

## Guides

- [Type Safety](https://stan.party/docs/guides/type-safety)
- [Server-Side Rendering](https://stan.party/docs/guides/ssr)
- [Caching](https://stan.party/docs/guides/caching)
- [Param Serialization](https://stan.party/docs/guides/param-serialization)
- [Error Handling](https://stan.party/docs/guides/error-handling)
